videos.headline: Nate Hopkins' 11-yard scamper puts UConn up 7-3
videos.description: Freshman Nate Hopkins takes the handoff 11 yards to give UConn a 7-3 lead at the end of the first quarter.

videos.headline: McBeath strips UConn QB Pindell, Crusaders take possession
videos.description: Crusaders linebacker Nick McBeath strips UConn quarterback David Pindell near the sideline to give Holy Cross the ball in UConn territory.

videos.headline: Pujals capitalizes on UConn turnover
videos.description: Holy Cross QB Peter Pujals connects with Blaise Bell for a 19-yard go-ahead touchdown.

videos.headline: UConn's Swann coughs up kickoff
videos.description: Crusaders' linebacker Jack McCabe strips Jordan Swann on kickoff giving Holy Cross great field position in UConn territory.

videos.headline: Walker adds to Crusaders' lead with rushing TD
videos.description: Holy Cross RB Diquan Walker takes handoff into end zone for 6-yard TD and 13-point lead over UConn.

videos.headline: Hopkins' 2nd TD closes gap for Huskies
videos.description: UConn RB Nate Hopkins takes handoff from three yards out into the end zone for a touchdown.

videos.headline: Crusaders' Bell fumbles away catch
videos.description: Holy Cross WR Blaise Bell has the ball knocked loose by UConn DB Marshe Terry.

videos.headline: Hopkins' 3rd TD extends Huskies lead
videos.description: UConn RB Nate Hopkins scores from 1-yard out
